abstract: An array of detected individual character bounding boxes.
overview:
## Discussion

If the associated [doc://Vision/documentation/Vision/VNDetectTextRectanglesRequest] request indicates interest in character boxes by setting the option `reportCharacterBoxes` to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], this property is non-`nil`. If no characters are found, it remains empty.

# characterBoxes

**Instance Property**

An array of detected individual character bounding boxes.

## Declaration

```swift
var characterBoxes: [VNRectangleObservation]? { get }
```

## Discussion

If the associated [doc://Vision/documentation/Vision/VNDetectTextRectanglesRequest] request indicates interest in character boxes by setting the option `reportCharacterBoxes` to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], this property is non-`nil`. If no characters are found, it remains empty.
title: characterBoxes
